body:
Adds several EpetraExt_BUILD_* options as well as an Amesos2_ENABLE_Basker
option. Adds `none` as an option to `gotype=`, which should be among the
options since 'none' is specifically handled later in the package
definition.

Adds `stokhos` and `trilinoscouplings` as options in spack which already
are available in CMake for Trilinos (e.g. Trilinos_ENABLE_Stokhos:BOOL=)

As a result of these changes, Xyce will be able to build against Trilinos installed with Spack.
title: Add internal package options to Trilinos
